data.title: Our Stories
data.summary: A react application that is for beginner authors and story tellers to either tell us a fictional story or one based on real life events.
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, bootstrap, react.js, Node.js, Express.js, mongoDB, Mongoose.js

data.title: Memories
data.summary: A react application that document all of your precious memories so that they do not get lost in time and you will look fondly in the future
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, bootstrap, react.js, Node.js, Express.js, mongoDB, Mongoose.js

data.title: Movies For You
data.summary: A react application that gets the latest and upcoming movies that are going to be playing at your theater. You can also search for existing movies and you will get the overview, ratings and the release date of that specific movie. The movie data is fetched from the TMDB API.
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, bootstrap, sass, react, redux

data.title: Marvel Heros
data.summary: A react application that searches for marvel heroes and villains then returns the latest comics of that hero/villain. The application uses data from the Marvel API.
data.tech_used: html, css, javascript, sass, react, redux

data.title: Pixabay Image Finder
data.summary: A react application that searches for pictures based on the user's input. The pictures are retrieved from the pixabay API
